genresAdvancedInfo.name: merida indie
genresAdvancedInfo.description: A music genre that emerged in the city of Merida, Mexico, in the early 2000s. It is characterized by its fusion of indie rock, folk, and traditional Mexican music. Merida indie often features lyrics in Spanish and is known for its introspective and poetic themes. The genre has gained popularity in Mexico and beyond, with many artists using it as a platform to express their cultural identity.
